name: The Apprentice: Revenge of the Dark Witch
name_original: The Apprentice: Revenge of the Dark Witch
description:
Being defeated by her own Apprentice in TriJam#181, the Dark Witch now forges a devious plan to get her revenge.

She wants to brew the ultimate unforgiving devastating destructive malicious ... deadly potion to throw it straight into her Apprenctice's face!

She. Will. Not. Forgive.

Join the dark side and help the witch to show the Apprentice her place!

In this Jam, time almost ran out... There's much more I'd like to have implemented, but I had to cut functionality. No highscores this time, sorry! The highscore list gets shown, but you can't enter your name.
